content: I saw the the compiler has recently started using PGO. Does that extend to the standard library? I'm looking at some amazingly bad inlining decisions in str::to_lowercase, and wondering if I need to bench my changes against some PGO'd build to see if it helps
No, primarily because we don't really have a good profile suite - rustc is probably not a typical Rust application, so it wouldn't work that well I suspect.
Well at least that makes my job easier
